origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketAnalysisAPI.get_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves economic analysis reports for specified regions and time frames.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which the report is requested, e.g., emerging_markets, developed_markets.'}, {'name': 'time_frame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the report, e.g., last_month, last_quarter, last_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The economic analysis report for the specified region and time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketAnalysisAPI.get_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'emerging_markets', 'time_frame'是'last_month'.
